content.text:
# Mnet Asian Music Awards in the Genre-Specific Awards Category

The following are the defunct titles in the Genre-Specific Awards Category given by the Mnet Asian Music Awards.
Best Indie Performance
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;"
|- style="background:#bebebe;"
!scope="col" style="width:10%;"| Year
!scope="col" style="width:25%;"| Winner(s)
!scope="col" style="width:20%;"| Song
!scope="col" style="width:25%;"| Nominee(s)
|-
!scope="row" style="text-align:center" |1999(1st)
|No Brain
|"Youth 98"
|style="font-size: 85%;"|
* Dr. Core 911 - "Sha Sha Funky Shake" (샤샤 펑키 쉐이크)
* Dalpalan (DJ 달파란) - "휘파람별의 초대"
* Blue Punk Bugs (푸펑충) - "어둠의 자식들"
* 황신혜밴드 - "깡총"
|-
!scope="row" style="text-align:center" |2000(2nd)
|Crying Nut
|"Circus Magic"
|style="font-size: 85%;"|
* No Brain - "Songs for the Rioters" (청년폭도맹진가)
* Dr. Core 911 (닥터코어911) - "Rain" (비가)
* Lazy Bone (레이지본) - "큰푸른물"
* MP Hip-Hop All Stars - "초"
|-
!scope="row" style="text-align:center" |2001(3rd)
|Crying Nut
|"Deep in the Night"
|style="font-size: 85%;"|
* 3호선 버터 플라이  - "The Only Thing To Walk" (걷기만 해)
* No Brain - "Go To The Beach" (해변으로 가요)
* Rotten Apple - "Someone"
* All Lies Band - "초인술퍼맨"
|-
!scope="row" style="text-align:center" |2002(4th)
|Trans Fixion
|"Come Back to Me"
|style="font-size: 85%;"|
* 3rd Line Butterfly (3호선 버터플라이) - "Photosynthesis" (광합성)
* Lazy Bone - (레이지본) - "큰푸른물"
* Sugar Donut - "책받침 아가씨"
* Johnny Royal - "Regeneration" (갱생)
|}
Best House & Electronic
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:100%"
|- style="background:#bebebe;"
!scope="col" style="width:10%;"| Year
!scope="col" style="width:25%;"| Winner(s)
!scope="col" style="width:20%;"| Song
!scope="col" style="width:25%;"| Nominee(s)
|-
!scope="row" style="text-align:center" |2007(9th)
|Clazziquai
|"Lover Boy"
|style="font-size: 85%;"|
* Banana Girl - "Chocolate"
* House Rulez - "Do It"
* Humming Urban Stereo - "Baby Love"
* Lexy - "Above The Sky"
|-
!scope="row" style="text-align:center" |2008(10th)
|Jewelry
|"One More Time"
|style="font-size: 85%;"|
* Gummy - "I'm Sorry" ft. T.O.P
* Brown Eyed Girls - "Love"
* Big Bang - "Haru Haru"
* Uhm Jung-hwa - "Disco"
|-
!scope="row" style="text-align:center" |2009(11th)
|Brown Eyed Girls
|"Abracadabra"
|style="font-size: 85%;"|
* Son Dam-bi - "Saturday Night"
* Clazziquai - "Love Again"
* 4Minute - "Muzik"
* G-Dragon - "Heartbreaker"
|}
Best Trot
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:100%"
|- style="background:#bebebe;"
!scope="col" style="width:19%;"| Year
!scope="col" style="width:25%;"| Winner(s)
!scope="col" style="width:20%;"| Song

|Hong Jin-young
|"Love's Battery"
|style="font-size: 85%;"|
* no nominees announced
|}
Best Digital Single
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:100%"
|- style="background:#bebebe;"
!scope="col" style="width:19%;"| Year
!scope="col" style="width:25%;"| Winner(s)
!scope="col" style="width:20%;"| Song
!scope="col" style="width:25%;"| Nominee(s)

|Park Bom
|"You and I"
|style="font-size: 85%;"|
** Jeong Yeob - "Without You"
** MC Mong - "Sick Enough to Die" (ft. Mellow)
** Monday Kiz - "Scatter"
** Supreme Team - "Then Then Then" (ft. Youngjun)
|}
See also
* Mnet Asian Music Award for Best Rap Performance
* Mnet Asian Music Award for Best Dance Performance
* Mnet Asian Music Award for Best Band Performance
* Mnet Asian Music Award for Best Vocal Performance

Notes
Each year is linked to the article about the Mnet Asian Music Awards held that year.
